      • sendToAllNear

        public void sendToAllNear(double x,
                          double y,
                          double z,
                          double radius,
                          int dimension,
                          Packet packetIn)
        params: x,y,z,r,dimension. The packet is sent to all players within r radius of x,y,z (r^2>x^2+y^2+z^2)

      • sendToAllNearExcept

        public void sendToAllNearExcept(EntityPlayer p_148543_1_,
                                double x,
                                double y,
                                double z,
                                double radius,
                                int dimension,
                                Packet p_148543_11_)
        params: srcPlayer,x,y,z,r,dimension. The packet is not sent to the srcPlayer, but all other players within the search radius
